body:
Add +external-libfabric variants to intel-mpi and intel-oneapi-mpi

Continuation of  #26943, rebased to latest develop. See that PR for background. This corrects some issues with the original implementation for finding libfabric.

Manual testing with:
spack install amg ^intel-mpi
spack install amg ^intel-mpi +external-libfabric
spack install amg ^intel-oneapi-mpi
spack install amg ^intel-oneapi-mpi +external-libfabric
And  verifying the RPATH in the amg binary

Added some tests: https://github.com/rscohn2/oneapi-spack-tests/pull/21

Co-authored with @stephenmsachs
